content: Execute Phase 1 - Clarification: Define agent requirements, validate scope, and establish success criteria
Execute Phase 2 - Exploration: Analyze system architecture patterns and dependency analysis needs
Execute Phase 3 - Analysis: Design dependency analysis capabilities and tool selection
Execute Phase 4 - Solution Presentation: Create comprehensive agent specification
Execute Phase 5 - Planning: Structure agent framework with 8-phase methodology integration
Execute Phase 6 - Implementation: Generate complete agent definition file
Execute Phase 7 - Ripple Effect: Ensure proper integration with workflow patterns
Execute Phase 8 - Validation: Verify agent meets all requirements and standards
